Articles.Content:
Nazari1382, this is supposed to be the area where people go to see active mods, and ones that are released for general use. You have no mod listed to download, and while I will admit it looks cool, there is still no download available.

I am letting you know because before the forumpocolipse, there were several modders who did this, and each was caught by the devs.

Nope, not uptight in the least. No review of this forum's purpose required, either. However, I would invite you to read again what I said, because you've apparently misunderstood. I never said you were attempting to sell content. The operative words here are "reminiscent of", meaning "in the character of" some of vital marketing that is prevalent today. It was a comment on the style, not the intent. And sorry, no, blurred and grainy pictures don't pique my interest. When you finally do release something, I'll be happy to take a look.

Nope, not uptight in the least. No review of this forum's purpose required, either. However, I would invite you to read again what I said, because you've apparently misunderstood. I never said you were attempting to sell content. The operative words here are "reminiscent of", meaning "in the character of" some of vital marketing that is prevalent today. It was a comment on the style, not the intent. And sorry, no, blurred and grainy pictures don't pique my interest. When you finally do release something, I'll be happy to take a look.

You are not required to read or post in this topic if it does not interest you

Well guys, I have to say I am slightly disappointed my preview post didn't meet the standards for what's interesting to Jack Wolfe. Personally, when I see a mod that is of no interest to me, I move along; maybe that is just me though. For anyone who finds new parts interesting, I will have a prototype for you to play around with *very* shortly. Hopefully some fun can be had with it while Jack is working on his mod.
The problem, Nazari1382, is that this is the release forum. As such, people expect releases. It's got nothing to do with any specific user's preferences, but the forum rules.

The problem, Nazari1382, is that this is the release forum. As such, people expect releases. It's got nothing to do with any specific user's preferences, but the forum rules.

Neat those are, aren't they.

The argument that you are saving space by skirting rules not only fails to make a compelling case, but also demonstrates, blantantly, that you feel they should not apply to you. What has clearly happened is knowing this thread will attract attention by being out of place and, therefore keeping it at the top of the thread list, the best strategy is to place it here. You are incorrect. Please update the main post to be in accordance with the rules of the forum, or kindly, respect those same rules by removing it to such place it does belong.

Edited May 21, 2013 by Hyomoto

Hope you're joking with that rant Hyomoto. I posted a teaser for a mod I am just about done with because I was excited about sharing it. This isn't a concept or an idea or a troll. It's a mod that I'm ironing out the final kinks on. I didn't post a pic to be the KSP Forum Outlaw or stir up your emotions. Relax.

Neat those are, aren't they.

The argument that you are saving space by skirting rules not only fails to make a compelling case, but also demonstrates, blantantly, that you feel they should not apply to you. What has clearly happened is knowing this thread will attract attention by being out of place and, therefore keeping it at the top of the thread list, the best strategy is to place it here. You are incorrect. Please update the main post to be in accordance with the rules of the forum, or kindly, respect those same rules by removing it to such place it does belong.

Its not just a release thread it is also a showcase which you can show off your mods and not have to release them. He is simply showing off his mod. So you sir just made your self sound like and idiot for attempting to quote a "rule" which as active as this thread has been and the amount of threads that get moved every day should tell you the forum moderators don't feel this is in the wrong thread as it follows under the SHOWCASE part of the forum. SO congrats on being one of the forum douchebags.
Prototype One available to test.

^

Now it is a release thread! I look forward to your mod mate.
Looks like 0.20 is available. Please feel free to test out the prototype like crazy and let me know of any issues or ideas.
Your glasparts works fine in 0.20 ^^ I posted two pics in your thread. That plane looks like a fun ride

-Rant-

Favorite post in the thread. You kicked that modder's ass with your awesome forum-lawyering! /sarc

Your glasparts works fine in 0.20 ^^ I posted two pics in your thread. That plane looks like a fun ride

You made the 2x2 panel the size of a football field =0. Nice. You should try scaling up the glass box and parking ships inside it.
Can you make an accomanying Seat and Non-Drone version also is the canopy noc-collision? (Im thinking of making Ejection seats c:)
calantlar - check out the youtube video in the first post, it'll show you how to use it for those purposes.
How would one go installing this for .20?

How would one go installing this for .20?

I just edited the first post's directions, they were wrong. Place the MP_Nazari folder in the KSP\GameData folder.

Alright, also I'm like an Alcoholic when it comes to US Planes, this cockpit was an awesome replica and I'd be thrilled if you remade the whole thing. I can also record your planes in action for Youtube, I get some great quality with my massive monitor.

Any parts that compliment this will most likely be built in a KSP-friendly way so they can be used in multiple vehicles, and not as one standalone vehicle. I'd definitely like to see my parts in any videos or streams.

Any parts that compliment this will most likely be built in a KSP-friendly way so they can be used in multiple vehicles, and not as one standalone vehicle. I'd definitely like to see my parts in any videos or streams.

Made an F-16 Fight Falcon (FIXED THE DESIGNATION) needs LAZOR and Procedual Wings. It has 8 missiles payload Much like in Real Life. I'll upload it if you like. Quite proud of it took me a couple hours to duplicate and lots of checking the real photo. I really love the F-18E, once Infinite Dice updates I want to land an assortment of Real Life US NAVY Aircraft on that baby. It just takes so long to duplicate fighters and its much easier just to drag and drop and have a Jet with its real Specifactions, fly time, and all that good stuff.

I can't wait for more.

Edited May 24, 2013 by Dilin
F-16 changed from F-14
Very nice. Try Kethane Gas Bombs. I don't think the people at the VAB enjoy them though.

Made an F-14 Fight Falcon needs LAZOR and Procedual Wings. It has 8 missiles payload Much like in Real Life. I'll upload it if you like. Quite proud of it took me a couple hours to duplicate and lots of checking the real photo. I really love the F-18E, once Infinite Dice updates I want to land an assortment of Real Life US NAVY Aircraft on that baby. It just takes so long to duplicate fighters and its much easier just to drag and drop and have a Jet with its real Specifactions, fly time, and all that good stuff.

I can't wait for more.

[img=http://cloud-2.steampowered.com/ugc/594752616464795300/AD76D4DBDE92D9341AFE48386378CA4F0BC9D43F/]
[img=http://cloud-2.steampowered.com/ugc/594752616464795733/50B7A44370618A5544403D4C7D542E0BFF6CD97F/]
[img=http://cloud-2.steampowered.com/ugc/594752616464794769/05EB99C06E4C1236C1C81A0652AB4B0776F54B93/]

I think you mean F-16 Fighting Falcon. The F-14 Tomcat (and Super Tomcat) are twin-engine twin-seater interceptors. The F-16 is a single-engine single-seat multirole. They don't look anything alike.

R.I.P. Lanson Kerman...

Here Lies Lanson Kerman

He died 5/23/2013

7:55PM on a collision with the ground and accidental weapons misfire at the same time.

No body could be recovered.

I wish we had parachutes and an Ejection system, he could of lived

He will be missed, he was clearing the launch pad and surrounding areas of the KSC when the controls literally malfunctioned and sent the plane into a spin at low altitude, there was no time to recover from it. The plane was already pointed at the Ground by the time the plane started to pull up. He will be missed. Jebidiah Bill and Bob watched it happen in front of their eyes... They died a bit on the inside that day.

5/23/2013

8:05 PM

R.I.P Jebidiah

He died getting Bob onto the Cart to make a Memorial for Lanson... THIS IS A TERRIBLE DAY FOR KERBALS EVERYWHERE... MANY QUESTIONS NEED TO BE ANSWERED... WHY HAS THIS HAPPENED.

I will not stand for this.

5/23/2013

8:37 PM

Attempted to save the kerbals that were launched 10KM away with a rover and lots of seats, it ended terribly, somehow the Space shuttle used to transport the kerbals was launched 6KM in to the air and somehow didn't explode when it reached Kerbin again. The two kerbals are now going to walk 5+ KM to the Flipped rover and attempt to unflip to get back to base and finally make the two memorial sites.

Edited May 24, 2013 by Dilin
Last time I checked there was a kerbal ejection system mod somewhere around here, I know that currently the parachute mod is busted.....
